chunk:
Epara Skincare Balancing Face Oil (2020 formulation)

Brand: Epara

Category: Facial Moisturizer/Treatment

Ingredients: Moringa Oleifera Seed Extract, Sclerocarya Birrea Seed Oil, Argania Spinosa Kernel Oil, Glycyrrhiza Glabra Root Extract, Prunus Armeniaca Kernel Oil, Cananga Odorata Flower Oil, Boswellia Carterii Oil, Tocopherol, Linalool, Limonene, Benzyl Benzoate, Benzyl Salicylate, Farnesol, Geraniol, Benzyl Alcohol, Eugenol, Isoeugenol

Directions: Massage a few drops onto skin after cleansing, as often as required.

Ingredient concerns: HIGH: Allergies & Immunotoxicity; MODERATE: Developmental and Reproductive Toxicity; LOW: Cancer, Use Restrictions
